name: Firefox: Advanced Locationbar Style
description: You don't know what «Advanced Locationbar» (ex. Locationbar²) means? Tis a great add-on to style the location bar within your Firefox. And here is some CSS to make it look even nicer... at least, this is my opinion! ;) There are different colors for different document types. Currently there are 3 different «colored» groups: • Static documents (.htm, .html and .txt) • Dynamic documents (.php, .php3, .php4, .cgi, .asp, .jsp, .cfm) • Images (.jpeg, .jpg, .bmp, .tiff, .png, .gif)
